title: What are the ritual practices and dietary requirements of lunar fasting and purification?
first_phrase: In this text, the author talks about the rituals and practices associated with lunar fasting that are followed by novices and experienced practitioners. In the last 200 tokens, he discusses the importance of purgation and sweating during fasting. The author emphasizes that rituals like vigilance and collective celebrations are gradually integrated, but purgation is essential for a perfect fasting experience. They explain how sweating and kidney cleansing can help achieve cutaneous regeneration and purify the body. The author also sheds light on ancient practices and compares them to modern medicine.

last_phrase: In conclusion, it is essential to note that the process of purification and detoxification is gradual, and novices cannot expect immediate results. Purgation, defecation, and sweating are crucial aspects of fasting and ritual practices. The purification of the body, including the kidneys and urine, was emphasized in ancient teachings. In addition, natural remedies like herbs and flowers were believed to correspond to the microcosmic elements of the psyche. Overall, a holistic approach to purification and detoxification is crucial for enhancing physical and spiritual well-being.
